title: support
body:
I went to the league main page and pressed support to submit a request, but i can't see the answer or even my own "ticket"
support not working or just my pc?  using opera browser by the way


sorry about english hope i was clear

replies.body: Sometimes that support page won't load correctly if the browser cache is pulling up old data for some weird reason. Do me a favor and try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies), and if that doesn't work try opening your tickets in a different browser like Firefox or Chrome.

Heya, if the support site is ever not working you should be able to discuss with them via the email address associated with your League of Legends account. You should get emails from them there, and can email support(at)riotgames(dot)com to start a new ticket.
problem is that im not sure about the email i used for the account

You can *open* a ticket from any email - if you open a new one from the email you have access to they'll respond to it asking you to verify account ownership, then they can change the email for you :)
